Author: KangasZ
Name: Radar Plugin
Description:
3D Radar to see enemies, objects, and interactables through walls.
This is an ESP, please don't use it to call aliens down.
Please report any issues to the author.
Changelog:
Moved some settings from utility to main menu
Changed command syntax and included chat receipt
Added max distance to aggro radius
Added override invisible check for player characters
Added level rendering to text
Added level-based rendering.
